author: Soma Biswas
title: iHeart Skips Interest Payment to Bondholders
text:
iHeartCommunications Inc. on Thursday said it skipped a $106 million interest payment due to bondholders.
The missed payment doesnâ€™t mean iHeart, the largest radio network in the U.S. by number of stations, is in default, but it does kick off a 30-day grace period during which the company and its creditors will try to negotiate a debt-restructuring deal.
